description: A delicious dinner that also doubles as a make ahead lunch!
name: Spiralized Sweet Potato Enchilada Bowls
recipeIngredient: 1 medium sized sweet potato, peeled and spiralized
1 (15 oz) can black beans, drained and rinsed
1 small can enchilada sauce, about 2 cups
Optional toppings: Diced avocado, tomato, cilantro, salsa

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large pan over medium heat and add the olive oil and onion. Saut√© onion for 2 minutes and then add the peppers and sweet potato. Cook vegetables until tender, 7-10 minutes.
Next, add the black beans, corn and all the spices. Stir and let cook for 2 minutes.
Pour enchilada sauce in, mix until combined and then cook until everything is heated through, about 5 minutes.
Serve over rice, if desired, and top with your favorite toppings.
